description: Generates Angular's @Injectable classes to access translation messages from JSON.
title: Options for ng-translation-gen

___separator.description: File name separator between base name and locale

___output.description: Folder where the generated TS clases will be placed.

___defaultLocale.description: Default locale. The file name of the default locale doesn't include the locale.

___locales.description: A list of locales which can be processed

___input.description: Folder containing the translation JSON files to read from.

___mapping.description: A mapping from JSON file (without extension) to the TS class name. Must be in the form: file1=Class1:file2=Class2:...

___argumentType.description: Type for generated arguments. Defaults to 'string', but may be set to more permissive types, such as 'string | number' or even 'any'.
